title: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta, cook tomatoes, mix together, add basil.

title: Grilled Chicken Salad
instructions: Grill chicken, chop veggies, mix together.

title: Cheesy Tomato Sandwich
instructions: Layer cheese and tomato between bread and grill.

title: Beef Stir Fry
instructions: Stir-fry beef with pepper, add soy sauce, serve with rice.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
instructions: Fry shrimp and rice with egg, season with soy sauce.

title: Bacon and Egg Breakfast
instructions: Cook bacon and egg, serve with toasted bread.

title: Mushroom Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta, sauté mushrooms in butter, mix together.

title: Turkey Sandwich
instructions: Layer turkey, lettuce, and mayonnaise between bread slices.

title: Spicy Sausage Noodles
instructions: Cook sausage with chili, add noodles and soy sauce.

title: Spinach and Cheese Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs, add spinach and cheese, cook in butter.

title: Honey Yogurt Parfait
instructions: Layer yogurt and honey in a glass.

title: Salmon Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook salmon, serve over rice with cucumber and soy sauce.

title: Chili Butter Shrimp
instructions: Cook shrimp with butter and chili until fragrant.

title: Crispy Potato Tortilla
instructions: Fry potatoes, wrap in tortilla with cheese.

title: Cucumber Salad
instructions: Slice cucumber, mix with vinegar.

title: Basil Butter Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta, toss with basil and melted butter.

title: Cheesy Bacon Noodles
instructions: Cook noodles, mix with bacon and cheese.

title: Milk Bread Pudding
instructions: Mix bread with milk, egg, and honey, then bake.
